dict.string: AdventurePlanner app needs to access your camera so that you can take a photo
AdventurePlanner app needs to access your Media Library so that you can pick a photo from it.
Speech Recognition is used to convert your speech into text.
Microphone is used to record your voice to create Voice Notes and to record your speech so that it can be converted to text.
Face ID or Touch ID is used to authenticate you as the real user of the app
